data.title: Sen. Lindsey Graham, Sen. John Boozman, Dr. Jack Graham
data.meta_description: On Wednesday's edition of "Washington Watch with Tony Perkins" Senate Judiciary Committee member Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) joins Tony with today's breaking news from the U.S. Supreme Court regarding Justice Kennedy. Chairman of the Subcommittee on Homeland Security, Sen. John Boozman (R-Ark.), joins Tony to discuss the announcement of Justice Kennedy's retirement earlier today and he'll weigh in on what efforts are being made to strengthen border security. Also, Jack Graham, pastor of Prestonwood Baptist Church in Plano, Texas, joins us to share about the upcoming start of "Call2Fall" this July, where across America thousands of Christians will join in kneeling to pray for our nation. Then, Pastor Graham will share how his church, Prestonwood Baptist, is helping immigrant families.
data.text:
On Wednesday's edition of "Washington Watch with Tony Perkins" Senate Judiciary Committee member Sen. Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) joins Tony with today’s breaking news from the U.S. Supreme Court regarding Justice Kennedy. Chairman of the Subcommittee on Homeland Security, Sen. John Boozman (R-Ark.), joins Tony to discuss the announcement of Justice Kennedy’s retirement earlier today and he’ll weigh in on what efforts are being made to strengthen border security. Also, Jack Graham, pastor of Prestonwood Baptist Church in Plano, Texas, joins us to share about the upcoming start of “Call2Fall” this July, where across America thousands of Christians will join in kneeling to pray for our nation. Then, Pastor Graham will share how his church, Prestonwood Baptist, is helping immigrant families.

Related Radio Resources:

Call in at 866-372-7234
